data.text: Mazɔlɔɔ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa Zakɔɓe mavofodai maawɔinɠa,
Nuɓusɛiti ti ga wɛɛinti,
Izilayɛle, voloi Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI dooɠogi veezu la è ʋɛ,
ɗa ɲɛɛɠulasu wuyei nii loo Ɓaɓilɔne masagi ma,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ta-ɓakɔi ɠaleɠalea,
Zɔi ná-ziiɠoloɠologi zu, é ɠɛni nuɓusɛiti doɠazu ga kpakɔi,
Eteai pɛ ka niina dooɠogi ta ziilɛigi zu,
Gului daa ga sipɛlɛgi, naati koozunɛɛʋɛ, too vai zu bu,
Gɔvɛalaazu eteai é buu ʋelei, é ɓalia ɗa-vaa zu,
Ti pɛ ta ɓɔɛ è ʋɔ, ti ɠɛ è ma:
Ɗa-wasogi è voɓega, è yei gɔvɛalaazu
È looʋɛ ɠale! È zeɠe geeɠɔlɔgi zu,
È ɠɛni bosu è-yiimaʋɛ ga:
Nà lɛɛzu tonaɓiingiti zeemaazuʋɛ,
Kɛlɛ è loa bu, GALA ge è laaʋiligɛ,
Niiti ti è ɠaazu, ta ɠaazulosu è ʋa, ti ɗa è zumɔ:
É ɠɛni eteai zuwosu, é ɗa kɛ ga teʋebai,
«Zii ɠiligiti ta-masagiti pɛ, ungo, ti pɛ,
Kɛlɛ ɗɔun ɗa, è maaɠoozani ɗa-ɠabai ʋa,
È la ɓɔga ti ʋa, wo ɠɛ kaba ɠila su,
À ná-doun zunuiti undaaʋili fai ɠɛʋele ɓɛtɛ,
«Nà wuzeɠezu Ɓaɓilɔne nuiti daalɔɠɔma,»
«Nà naa ɠɛ ga zɛligoiti puuzuʋɛ, ʋɛ palaʋalai ná,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, Fai-Pɛ-Maliɠii ɠonani, é ɠɛ ma:
Nà Asiili ná-zobogi zuɠoloɠolo nà-zooi zu,
Deve ɠaaɓelagi ɠana,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, Fai-Pɛ-Maliɠii deve ɠaaɓelagi tɔna seɠea,
Kpaazaɠai é woni, masagi Aɠaze zaa ɠonagi.
«Filisiti yooi pɛ, à mina ɠoozunɛ
Bala nuiti nuɓusɛiti saama, ta ɠɔnɔgi zɔlɔɔ,
Ee, siɠidaʋɛ, gɔlɔi wo!
Gooɠaaʋotegi ɓɛgele ɠa ada fe Filisiti nuiti ta-ɠeelaiti zea?
